title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - 'Sharp or Square' NFL Week 13 Picks and Betting Breakdown
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - 'Sharp or Square' NFL Week 13 Picks and Betting Breakdown
description:
Colin does "Fake Questions, Real Answers" on some harsh truth for the most rabid college football fans, the word people use that drives him crazy, his reaction to the MLB lockout, and what it says about LeBron's Lakers that ESPN moved their game off national TV (3:00). Then, The Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin his NFL Week 13 picks are "sharp" or "square". They discuss Patriots/Bills (12:00), Chargers/Bengals (14:00), Giants/Dolphins (17:00), Broncos/Chiefs (23:00), 49ers/Seahawks (26:00), Eagles/Jets (27:00), Steelers/Ravens (28:00), Jaguars/Rams (30:00), Bucs/Falcons (31:00), and Vikings/Lions (31:00). Then, they look at the aftermath of an unforgettable week in college football week, on - and off - the field (32:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
